channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Computing across Trust Boundaries using Distributed Homomorphic Cryptography
item.description: Christian Mouchet and Juan Troncoso-Pastoriza and Jean-Pierre Hubaux

item.title: Faster homomorphic encryption is not enough: improved heuristic for multiplicative depth minimization of Boolean circuits
item.description: Pascal Aubry and Sergiu Carpov and Renaud Sirdey

item.title: Zaphod: Efficiently Combing LSSS and Garbled Circuits in SCALE
item.description: Abdelrahaman Aly and Emmanuela Orsini and Drago Rotaru and Nigel P. Smart and Tim Wood

item.title: Towards real-time hidden speaker recognition by means of fully homomorphic encryption
item.description: Martin Zuber and Sergiu Carpov and Renaud Sirdey

item.title: PrivFL: Practical Privacy-preserving Federated Regressions on High-dimensional Data over Mobile Networks
item.description: Kalikinkar Mandal and Guang Gong

item.title: RAMPARTS: A Programmer-Friendly System for Building Homomorphic Encryption Applications
item.description: David W. Archer and Jose Manuel Calderon Trilla and Jason Dagit and Alex J. Malozemoff and Yuriy Polyakov and Kurt Rohloff and Gerard Ryan

item.title: Randomly Rotate Qubits Compute and Reverse --- IT-Secure Non-Interactive Fully-Compact Homomorphic Quantum Computations over Classical Data Using Random Bases
item.description: Dor Bitan and Shlomi Dolev

item.title: Optimal-Round Preprocessing-MPC via Polynomial Representation and Distributed Random Matrix (extended abstract)
item.description: Dor Bitan and Shlomi Dolev

item.title: On Fully Secure MPC with Solitary Output
item.description: Shai Halevi and Yuval Ishai and Eyal Kushilevitz and Nikolaos Makriyannis and Tal Rabin

item.title: CrypTFlow: Secure TensorFlow Inference
item.description: Nishant Kumar and Mayank Rathee and Nishanth Chandran and Divya Gupta and Aseem Rastogi and Rahul Sharma

item.title: HEAX: High-Performance Architecture for Computation on Homomorphically Encrypted Data in the Cloud
item.description: M. Sadegh Riazi and Kim Laine and Blake Pelton and Wei Dai

item.title: Efficient Private PEZ Protocols for Symmetric Functions
item.description: Yoshiki Abe and Mitsugu Iwamoto and Kazuo Ohta

item.title: Adaptively Secure Garbling Schemes for Parallel Computations
item.description: Kai-Min Chung; Luowen Qian

item.title: On the Security of Multikey Homomorphic Encryption
item.description: Hyang-Sook Lee and Jeongeun Park

item.title: Distributed Vector-OLE: Improved Constructions and Implementation
item.description: Phillipp Schoppmann and Adrià Gascón and Leonie Reichert and Mariana Raykova

item.title: Cryptanalysis of a Protocol for Efficient Sorting on SHE Encrypted Data

item.title: Is Information-Theoretic Topology-Hiding Computation Possible?
